parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to collect control plane logs to Simple Log Service.

parameters.name: LogTTLInDay
parameters.description: The time to live (TTL) period of the collected logs. Unit: day.

parameters.name: Project
parameters.description: The name of the Simple Log Service project to which control plane logs are collected.

parameters.name: ServiceMeshId
parameters.description: The ID of the Service Mesh (ASM) instance.
